name: PawPerfect Pet Boarding
description: Model Context Protocol provider for the PawPerfect pet boarding and grooming application. This MCP provider enables AI agents to access booking data, service information, availability, pet details, and customer records.

tools.name: book_appointment
tools.description: Create a new booking for a pet service. This tool allows scheduling appointments for boarding, grooming, or other services.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the service to book (e.g., 'boarding-standard', 'grooming-deluxe')

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: The ID of the pet for which the service is being booked

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The starting date for the service in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The starting time in 24-hour format (HH:MM)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The ending date for multi-day services like boarding (YYYY-MM-DD). Optional for single-day services.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The ending time in 24-hour format (HH:MM)

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Any special instructions or notes for this booking
examples: Please ensure water bowl is always full

tools.name: create_customer
tools.description: Create a new customer record in the system. This is required before adding pets or making bookings.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: Customer's first name

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Customer's last name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Customer's email address for communication and login

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Customer's phone number for urgent communications

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Customer's physical address

tools.name: add_pet
tools.description: Register a new pet associated with an existing owner

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: ID of the pet's owner

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Pet's name

parameters.name: breed
parameters.description: Pet's breed, or 'Mixed' if not purebred

parameters.name: age
parameters.description: Pet's age in years

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: Pet's weight in pounds

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Pet's gender: male, female, or unknown

parameters.name: isVaccinated
parameters.description: Whether the pet is up-to-date on vaccinations

parameters.name: specialNeeds
parameters.description: Any special care instructions or medical requirements

tools.name: check_availability
tools.description: Query available time slots for a specific service and date range

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the service to check availability for

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for availability search (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for availability search (YYYY-MM-DD), optional for single-day lookups

services.description: Information about available pet boarding and grooming services offered by PawPerfect. Services include dog boarding, cat boarding, dog grooming, and special care packages.

services.name: Standard Dog Boarding
services.description: Comfortable overnight stay for your dog with basic care and feeding.
List of available services with details including pricing, capacity, and service descriptions

serviceId.description: Unique identifier for the service, typically in format 'category-name'

name.description: Display name of the service as shown to customers

description.description: Detailed description of what the service includes, benefits, and special features
examples: Includes bath, nail trim, ear cleaning, and coat styling.

price.description: Base price of the service in USD

priceUnit.description: How the price is charged - per_night for boarding or per_session for grooming

category.description: Primary category of the service - either 'boarding' for overnight stays or 'grooming' for beauty services

durationInMinutes.description: For grooming services, the expected duration in minutes. For boarding, typically 1440 (24 hours)

capacity.description: Maximum number of pets that can be accommodated for this service per day

isArchived.description: Whether this service is currently active (false) or has been archived (true)

bookings.description: Information about confirmed, pending, or completed pet boarding and grooming bookings. Use this context to retrieve details about specific bookings, check a customer's booking history, or generate booking reports.
List of bookings with their complete details, statuses and scheduling information

bookingId.description: Unique identifier for the booking with format BOK-XXXXXXXX

serviceId.description: ID of the booked service, references the serviceId field in the services context

startDate.description: ISO 8601 formatted date when the booking begins

startTime.description: Starting time for the booking in 24-hour format (HH:MM)

endDate.description: ISO 8601 formatted date when booking ends (only set for multi-day bookings like boarding)

endTime.description: Ending time for the booking in 24-hour format (HH:MM)

totalPrice.description: Total calculated price for the booking in USD

status.description: Current status of the booking: confirmed, cancelled, or completed

petId.description: ID of the pet for this booking, references the id field in the pets context

ownerId.description: ID of the pet owner, references the id field in the owners context

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 formatted date when the booking was created in the system

pets.description: Information about pets registered in the PawPerfect system. Includes details about pets' physical characteristics, health information, vaccination status, and care requirements.
List of pets with their complete profiles and care requirements

id.description: Unique numerical identifier for the pet

name.description: Pet's name as given by the owner

breed.description: Breed of the pet, or 'Mixed' if not a purebred

age.description: Age of the pet in years

weight.description: Weight of the pet in pounds

gender.description: Gender of the pet: male, female, or unknown

isVaccinated.description: Whether the pet is up-to-date on required vaccinations

specialNeeds.description: Special care instructions, dietary needs, or medical requirements

ownerId.description: ID of the pet's owner, references the id field in the owners context

vetName.description: Name of the pet's regular veterinarian

vetPhone.description: Contact phone number for the pet's veterinarian

vetAddress.description: Address of the pet's veterinary clinic

vetLastVisit.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of the pet's last veterinary visit

medicalHistory.description: Summary of significant medical history for the pet

medicationInstructions.description: Instructions for administering any required medications
examples: 1 pill with breakfast, 1 pill with dinner

dietaryRestrictions.description: Special dietary needs or food restrictions

behavioralNotes.description: Notes about the pet's behavior, temperament, or special handling needs
examples: Does not like other male dogs

owners.description: Information about pet owners registered with PawPerfect. Includes contact details and essential information for customer communication and booking management.
List of pet owners with their contact information

id.description: Unique numerical identifier for the owner

email.description: Owner's email address for communications and login

phone.description: Owner's phone number for urgent communications

availability.description: Information about service availability for specific dates and time slots. Used to check when services are available for booking and what capacity remains on each date.

serviceId.description: ID of the service to check availability for

startDate.description: Start date for the availability check in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate.description: End date for the availability check in YYYY-MM-DD format

availabilityInfo.description: Daily availability information for the requested date range

available.description: Whether the service has any availability on this date

totalCapacity.description: Total capacity for this service on this date

bookedCount.description: Number of bookings already confirmed for this date

remainingCapacity.description: Number of spots still available for booking

timeSlots.description: For grooming services, the specific time slots available. Boarding services don't use time slots.

available.description: Whether this specific time slot is available for booking
